name: ai-devops-framework
description: Enhanced Institutional Memory Guardrails with Claude Code Best Practices - Core File Focus

scripts.memory:validate: node -e "require('./institutional-memory-enforcer.js').runMandatoryPreChecks().then(r => console.log('✅ Memory validation passed')).catch(e => {console.error('❌ Memory validation failed:', e.message); process.exit(1);})"
scripts.memory:drift: node -e "require('./institutional-memory-enforcer.js').detectDrift().then(r => r.driftDetected ? (console.error('❌ Drift detected'), process.exit(1)) : console.log('✅ No drift detected'))"

author: AI DevOps Framework
